para.p: This document is a sampler of the kind of MathML produced by LaTeXML, primarily for testing for sufficient MathML support. It is not a comprehensive test, nor a torture test.
The m:semantics, m:annotation, and m:annotation-xml elements will be exercised if you generate both presentation and content during post-processing using the --pmml --cmml options.
Token elements m:mi, m:mo and m:mn, with various attributes @mathvariant, @mathsize and @class.

Math.text: list@(A, A, A, A, A, A, A)
list@(x * y, x, y, x, y)

para.p: Various layout schemata m:mrow, m:mfrac (with various @linethickness), and m:mstyle:

Math.text: list@(a / b, a / b, a / b)
list@(binomial@(a, b) * (a FRACOP b), a / b, a / b, a / b)
list@(a / b, a ^ 2 / b ^ 2, ((integral _ a) ^ b)@(f * x * differential-d@(x)) / ((integral _ a) ^ b)@(g * x * differential-d@(x)))

para.p: Roots m:msqrt and m:mroot, as well as enclosures m:menclose:

Math.text: list@(square-root@(x), nth-root@(3, x), nth-root@(3, x), x ^ 2, not-?)
list@(a + b, a + b, a + b, a + b)
X = f * x + g * x + h * x
f * x + g * x + h * x

para.p: Not used: m:mfenced, m:mphantom; used only for errors: m:merror.
A variety of sub- and super-scripts (m:msub, m:msup, m:msubsup), under- and over-scripts (m:munder, m:mover, m:munderover), some as accents, and pre-scripts (m:multiscripts, m:mprescripts, m:none).

Math.tex: a^{b},\qquad a^{b^{c}},\qquad a^{b^{c^{d}}},\qquad a_{b},\qquad a_{b_{c}},% \qquad a_{b_{c_{d}}},\qquad a^{b}_{c}
Math.text: list@(a ^ b, a ^ b ^ c, a ^ b ^ c ^ d, a _ b, a _ b _ c, a _ b _ c _ d, (a ^ b) _ c)
list@(sum ^ b, sum _ b, (sum ^ b) _ c)

formulae@(X = (sum _ (1 less= i less= j less= n))@(X _ (i * j)), formulae@(X = (sum _ (1 less= i less= j less= n))@(X _ (i * j)), formulae@(X = (sum _ (1 less= i less= j less= n))@(X _ (i * j)), X = (sum _ (1 less= i less= j less= n))@(X _ (i * j)))))
list@(a * def@(rightarrow) * b, a * def@(rightarrow) * b, a * overrightarrow@(def) * b, a * underrightarrow@(def) * b)
list@(_ p F _ q, (_ a ^ b sum ^ c) _ d)

para.p: Some basic tabular math (m:mtable, m:mtr, m:mtd); many combinations of row and column spacing and spans (@rowspacing, @columnspacing, @columnspan, @rowspan) are not currently tested.
Not currently used: m:mstack, m:mlongdiv, m:msgroup, m:msrow, m:mscarries, m:mscarry, m:msline.
